title: Week 5 preview & Colts vs. Texans recap
itunes:title: Week 5 preview & Colts vs. Texans recap
description:
A room filled with heroes - Dan Hanzus, Gregg Rosenthal, Chris Wesseling and Marc Sessler – recap the Thursday Night Football game between the Colts and the Texans that saw Houston quarterback Ryan Mallet benched for the second week in a row, and another win for Indianapolis backup quarterback Matt Hasselbeck. Then, the heroes go game by game as they preview each Week 5 matchup.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
